title: How to Make a Jolly Rancher Cocktail

steps.headline: Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker.
Pour the melon liquor into the cocktail shaker.
Fill the rest of the cocktail shaker with cranberry juice.
Pour over ice into a highball glass.

methods.name: Jolly Rancher Drink with Green Apple Vodka

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour the vodka into the highball glass.
Pour the schnapps into the highball glass.
(Optional) Top with Ginger ale or club soda for a fresher taste.

methods.name: Green Apple Flavored Jolly Rancher Drink

steps.headline: Fill a rock glass with ice.
Pour the whiskey into the glass.
Pour the Midori into the glass.
Pour the sweet and sour mix into the glass.

text: Jolly Rancher Flavored Drink Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker.  Pour the melon liquor into the cocktail shaker.  Fill the rest of the cocktail shaker with cranberry juice.  Shake well.  Pour over ice into a highball glass.  Jolly Rancher Drink with Green Apple Vodka Fill a highball glass with ice.  Pour the vodka into the highball glass.  Pour the schnapps into the highball glass.  Top with the cranberry juice.  Stir well.  (Optional) Garnish with an orange wedge.  (Optional) Top with Ginger ale or club soda for a fresher taste.  Green Apple Flavored Jolly Rancher Drink Fill a rock glass with ice.  Pour the whiskey into the glass.  Pour the Midori into the glass.  Pour the sweet and sour mix into the glass.  Stir well.  Finished.
